design_system.name: Onyx Terminal
design_system.description: A high-performance, data-dense trading environment inspired by Bloomberg Terminals and Cyberpunk aesthetics. Prioritizes speed, clarity, and eye comfort in low-light environments.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(124,58,237,0.2)] hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(124,58,237,0.4)]
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium
buttons.outline: border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md
buttons.destructive: bg-destructive text-destructive-foreground hover:bg-destructive/90 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md

cards.default: rounded-xl border border-white/10 bg-zinc-900/50 text-card-foreground shadow-sm backdrop-blur-sm
cards.interactive: rounded-xl border border-white/10 bg-zinc-900/50 text-card-foreground shadow-sm backdrop-blur-sm hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors cursor-pointer

inputs.default: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

tables.wrapper: relative w-full overflow-auto rounded-md border border-white/10
tables.header: h-12 px-4 text-left align-middle font-medium text-muted-foreground [&:has([role=checkbox])]:pr-0

icons.instructions: Use Lucide React icons for all UI elements. For specific tech logos not found in Lucide, use the image URLs provided above or generic 'Database', 'Cpu', 'Activity' icons.

landing.layout: Hero section with 'landing_city' as background with heavy overlay. Feature grid using 'glassmorphism' cards. Trust section with partner logos.
landing.elements: Large 'Get Started' CTA with neon glow. Animated text for value props.

dashboard.layout: Bento grid layout. Sidebar navigation. Top bar with global market indices.
dashboard.elements: Real-time charts (Recharts). Scrollable news feed. Quick action buttons for 'New Trade'.

screener.layout: Full-width data table. Collapsible filter panel on the left or top.
screener.elements: Dense table rows. Color-coded columns for 'Profit' (Green) and 'Loss' (Red). Range sliders for filters.

pmcc_builder.layout: Two-column layout: 'Long Leg' selection vs 'Short Leg' selection. Payoff diagram at the bottom.
pmcc_builder.elements: Interactive strike price selectors. Profit/Loss calculator card.

universal_guidelines: Ensure text contrast meets WCAG AA standards, especially on dark backgrounds.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all financial data (prices, percentages, Greeks).
Do not use pure black (#000000); use Zinc-950 (#09090b) for better eye comfort.
Add 'backdrop-blur' to all floating elements (modals, sticky headers).
Implement 'Skeleton' loaders for all data-fetching states.
